ModMetaData.name: EdB Interface
ModMetaData.author: EdB
ModMetaData.description:
This mod makes a handful of changes to the game's user interface. Some features are only recommended for larger window sizes, but if you're running in a smaller window, you can shut off the features that do not work as well.
Adds the Colonist Bar along the top of the gameplay window, giving you another way to select colonists and to quickly see their status.
Organize your colonists into squads using the Squads window and display them by squad in the colonist bar. Assign keyboard shortcuts to quickly display and select your squads.
Adds an Inventory window, showing counts of all of your colony's resources, apparel, weapons, buildings, etc.
Changes the layout of several tabs, windows and panels.
Look at Interface Options dialog, which you can get to by clicking on the gameplay Menu. From here you can disable any of the mod's features that you don't like.
[Version 3.1.2]
